name: P2 Just Climbin'
description:
C͟͞o͟͞n͟͞t͟͞r͟͞o͟͞l͟͞s͟͞ P1, W,A,D. "END" Key = End Game. "R" Key = Restart Game.

(warning, pressing R to restart the game does not restart the score. the score will stay the same unless you close and re-open the game)

Try to climb more platforms than your friend! (moving platforms do NOT count)

This version of the game is meant for right handed players. (Arrow Keys)
